# Verraketh's Shadow Crown (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Charm Spells|charm]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Bard Spells|Bard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Components:** V

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Races of Faerun (WotC), pg 191

Created by the legendary Shadowking of the Talfir, *Verrakethâ€™s shadow crown* cloaks the top of your head in a crown of magical shadow. For the duration of this spell, your bardic music abilities tap the Shadow Weave instead of the Weave. You receive a +4 competence bonus on [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] checks while under the effects of this spell. The effects of this spell do not stack with the Shadow Weave Magic feat.
